thread.title: Peru Leads Region in Putting New Faith in Global Trade - WSJ
thread.title_full: Peru Leads Region in Putting New Faith in Global Trade - WSJ

author: Ryan Dube
title: Peru Leads Region in Putting New Faith in Global Trade - WSJ
text:
Peru Leads Region in Putting New Faith in Global Trade Parts of Latin America broaden embrace of globalization as U.S. veers toward protectionism Por Biografia Ryan Dube Feb. 8, 2017 5:30 a.m. ET 
OLMOS, Peru—This sun-baked valley of northern Peru, where foxes roamed a few years ago, is now a busy agricultural testament to globalization, powered with investments from as far away as Sweden and Israel. And here as elsewhere in the region, Europe and Asia—particularly China—are seen as key markets for securing future growth. 
In Peru, which has emerged as South America’s strongest free trade proponent, thousands of workers are... To Read the Full Story, Assinar ou Sign In Most Popular Videos
